original_text: While the people were still listening, Jesus told them a story. He did this because the people had wrong thoughts. He was now getting near to Jerusalem. So the people with him were thinking that God would begin to rule his people immediately.
korean_text: 그들이 이 말씀을 듣고 있을 때에 비유를 더하여 말씀하시니 이는 자기가 예루살렘에 가까이 오셨고 그들은 하나님의 나라가 당장에 나타날 줄로 생각함이더라

sentences.original_text: While the people were still listening
He did this because the people had wrong thoughts
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이렇게 하셨는데 그것은 사람들이 잘못된 생각을 가지고 있었기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: He was now getting near to Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이제 예루살렘에 가까이 가고 있었다

sentences.original_text: So the people with him were thinking
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그와 함께 있던 사람들은 생각하고 있었다

sentences.original_text: that God would begin to rule his people immediately
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 즉시 그의 백성을 다스리기 시작하실 것이라고
